name: kickstarter-static
description: Kickstarter for a simple static site build
author: Lee Marsden

scripts.css: stylelint 'src/css/**/**/*.scss' --syntax scss && mkdir -p dist/css && node-sass src/css/main.scss | postcss -u autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' | postcss -u postcss-vr | postcss -u postcss-pxtorem | postcss -u postcss-focus | postcss -u css-mqpacker > dist/css/main.css
scripts.js: eslint src/js/**/*.js && mkdir -p dist/js && browserify src/js/main.js -o dist/js/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run html && npm run css && npm run js
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run build:dev && npm run htmlMin && npm run postcss:csso && npm run uglify
